qas.question: When were the first couple Han Banners founded?
When did the Han Banners grow to eight?
Which leader defeated the Ming armies?
Where did the Ming armies retreat to?

context: This was followed by the creation of the first two Han Banners in <a0_0>1637<a0_0/> (increasing to eight in <a1_0>1642<a1_0/>). Together these military reforms enabled <a2_0>Hong Taiji<a2_0/> to resoundingly defeat Ming forces in a series of battles from 1640 to 1642 for the territories of Songshan and Jinzhou. This final victory resulted in the surrender of many of the Ming dynasty's most battle-hardened troops, the death of Yuan Chonghuan at the hands of the <a3_0>Chongzhen Emperor<a3_0/> (who thought Yuan had betrayed him), and the complete and permanent withdrawal of the remaining Ming forces <a4_0>north of the Great Wall<a4_0/>.
